nodes.text: Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beta

The Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beta is a limited-edition softcover rulebook published by Fantasy Flight Games for the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game. It was initially made available at Gen Con 2013 and first released through retailers on September 27, 2013.

The Age of Rebellion Beta includes the adventure "Operation: Shell Game" and came with seven character sheets, six with pre-made characters: Lelsk (Bothan Spy/Infiltrator), RA-7-D (Droid Engineer/Saboteur), Doleth (Duros Soldier, Commando), Gorbek Fask (Gran Diplomat/Ambassador), Jaxon Brand (Human Commander/Tactician), and Dero Jin (Sullustan Ace/Piot).

In Star Wars: Age of Rebellion, players take the fight to the oppressive Galactic Empire as cunning spies, cocky pilots, and dedicated soldiers in the Rebel Alliance. The Age of Rebellion beta offers players their chance to leave a mark on the Star Wars universe as they work with the game's developers to shape the best possible Rebellion experience!
